name: Safe for Work
description:
Safe for Work is a linear visual novel inspired by the Vtuber Randon Neuring! Journey along with your co-worker Randon amongst the most ridiculous situations while meeting new characters along the way! 

The VN contains cheesy writing, cursing, intense h*nd h*lding, simping, steamy baths, and sensual apple sauce/cake consumption. Viewer discretion is advised?

Note: This is my first visual novel that actually got to see the light of day. (the ones I made before shall never be seen by anyone hehehe). I am still relatively new to Ren'Py ,and hopefully, you can enjoy this little project I made. :D
